articles.content: Turkeys lira weakened in the aftermath of Recep Tayyip Erdoans re-election, as analysts warned that the next big test for the victorious president would be addressing the countrys shaky $900bn econom… [+3496 chars]

articles.author: Rob Hyde, Arthur Parashar
articles.title: As Germany enters recession, a look at life in Europe's 'economic powerhouse' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Rental, energy and supermarket prices are rising, tightening the purse strings further of an already thrifty nation. And last week, Germany was formally put into a recession.
articles.content: With no workers to fill job vacancies, bills spiralling out of control and a rise in drug addicts on the streets, Germany - still widely viewed as Europe's economic powerhouse - slipped into a recess… [+12220 chars]
